          <title>
            <string language="en">Obtaining copper from copper chloride</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erreichen kupfern von der kupfernen

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Obtention de cuivre du chlorure de cuivre</string>

          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows how to obtain copper from copper chloride using electric current.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, wie man Kupfer von der

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre comment obtenir le cuivre du
